nodes.text: There's no hope for you Plug-inator. The smooth experience is too powerful for you.
You don't know what I'm capable of. I'm going destroy your creation with one hand. It's like you've only just built it. Like in a single day.
It may be rough around the edges but it has the integrity of collaborative fibres binding it together.
Don't try and scare me with your browser-based revolution. I've been doing this for years. And it's never failed.

Think again granddad. We've injected an added dose of Protothon to our unmanned Chromes. And they're ready to drop some heavy RTC all over your plans. The fallout's going to be immense. So long Plug-inator. KABOOM
